title: Payroll data for 29,000 Facebook employees reportedly stolen
text: Banking information, Social Security digits, names and salaries were stolen from several unencrypted hard drives, a report says.

title: Facebook lost some hard drives in a car break-in, but former employees probably shouldn't worry â€” here's why
text: Theft of unencrypted hard drives from a Facebook employee's car led the company to announce another privacy and security incident to its employees.

title: Facebook, privacy activist Schrems battle nears end on Dec. 19
text: Austrian privacy activist Max Schrems' seven-year battle against Facebook reaches a crucial point on Dec. 17 when an adviser to Europe's top court will issue his view on whether tools used by companies to transfer data abroad are legal or not.

title: FTC's Look Into Facebook A 'Negative Development,' Says RBC's Mahaney
text: The Federal Trade Commission potential move to block Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) from combining its multiple apps into one is a "negative development" for the social media company, according to RBC Capital Markets' Mark Mahaney.

title: The Feds Might Try to Block Mark Zuckerberg's Grand Plan
text: Interoperability across Facebook's platforms could add convenience for users -- perhaps too much.

title: FTC considers injunction against Facebook over how its apps interact
text: Facebook is finding itself under more regulatory scrutiny over its proposal to integrate WhatsApp and Instagram.
